content:

**Article:** Peanut The Comrade's Author Page

**Author:** [[*user PeanutTheComrade]]
[[/<]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ About Me
[[/=]]

**Hey!** Names Bob, Bobby, Boob, or whatever else you'd like to call me. I'm an engineering college student who loves to write and make up random shit in my head //(the voices tell me things sometimes)//. I got into writing ever since I laid my hands on the SCP wiki for the first time, and I've always wanted to grow into a better writer. 

I hope to have at least one SCP in my lifetime that people love and know about (such as the classics). If I can make my mark on this community, I have done what I wanted... **BUT I CAN'T DO IT WITHOUT YA'LL**! 

If you're interested in __##green|supporting me##__, come check me out once in a while and give me a rating or two.

Peace.
----
@@ @@

[[module CSS]]
:root {
  --header-title: "The USSR Foundation";
  --header-subtitle: "Live. Laugh. Love.";
}
[[/module]]

[[tabview]]

[[tab Published SCPs]]

----

[[[scp-7298|SCP-7298]]] — SCPSL.exe

> //SCP-7298 is a laptop that turns the surrounding area into a playable video game. All living organisms and objects will be surrendered to the laptop. I wonder who had the crazy idea to boot it up at Site-02...//

[[[scp-7306|SCP-7306]]] — No More Regrets?

> //SCP-7306 is an anomalous polaroid film with the ability to bring people back into the past. This would bring them back into a place they most regret, such as hesitating to kiss that crush they've had since high school.//

[[[scp-7407|SCP-7407]]] — Love Locks

> //SCP-7407 is a fence where when a “love lock” is placed on it, it either makes the individuals never break apart OR if only one of them truly loves the other person the other individual who doesn’t will exhibit increasingly significant emotions towards the other to the point they become crazy.//

[[/tab]]
[[tab Published Tales]]

----

> Bit empty in here... don't you think?

[[/tab]]
[[tab WIP Pages]]

----

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-tale-good-morning-class |"Good Morning Class"]]]

> Tale about a retired researcher who is a professor at a university. He goes into detail about the possibility of weird anomalous phenomena after a student asks him questions.

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-9998-blinding-lights |SCP "Blinding Lights"]]]

> //The guilt of a brother keeps a totaled car driving making sure that any bad drivers die when using it.//

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-the-three-musketeers-peanutthecomrade |SCP "The Three Musketeers"]]]

> //Three gangbangers try to fuck up the Foundation but get caught because they're idiots.//

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-cissi-luzoniensis-by-peanutthecomrade |SCP "Cissi-Luzoniensis"]]]

> //Honestly, some shit I wrote in middle school and thought this was the best thing to happen ever since SCP-173. The concept is OK, but it needs polishing if I ever want to submit this.//

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-the-revelation |SCP "The Revelation"]]]

> //The lord has come the lord has come the lord has come the lord has come.//

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-xxxx-elf-on-the-shelf |SCP "Elf on the Shelf"]]]

> //An SCP derived from the "Elf on the Shelf" tradition. These elves act as Santa's personal scouts, celebrating Christmas and spreading cheer....... but their intentions aren't as sweet and innocent as you might think.//

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-game-of-war |SCP "Game of War"]]]

> //The SCP Foundation has come across a Chessboard that has control over all conflicts on Earth. In an effort to stop the violence and keep the peace, it seems to have done the opposite.//

[[/tab]]
[[tab Co-Authored Works]]

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/collab:comrade-alaea-fantasy|"Fantasy Foundation" Project]]]

> WIP -- A side project I'm working on with Alaea on Discord.

[[[https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/scp-fantasy-apollyon-scp|"God of Laughter" Project]]]

> WIP -- Co-authoring with Alaea on Discord; connects with the "Fantasy Foundation" Project

[[/tab]]

----
